title: Looking for a font w/ sexy girl silhouettes
content:
Dear All,

I am looking for a font that is sexy girl silhouettes (like the mudflap girl) and the girls spell out letters in the alphabet, ya know so the first girl silhouette is shaped to look like an A etc...

I have no image only a description...can anyone help?

Thanks so much,  
Bunnylou22
author: bunnylou22

comments.content: Can you explain "why" you want a font like that?

Dan,

Cause her name is Bunny :-)

[http://www.dafont.com/search.php?q=sexy&nb\_ppp\_old=10&page=1&text=Type+y...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424000354/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=sexy&nb_ppp_old=10&page=1&text=Type+your+text+here&nb_ppp=50&af=on&classt=alpha "http://www.dafont.com/search.php?q=sexy&nb\_ppp\_old=10&page=1&text=Type+your+text+here&nb\_ppp=50&af=on&classt=alpha") brings you closer

and I think you want this one  
 [http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=alpha\_silouettes&nb\_ppp=50&af=on](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424000354/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=alpha_silouettes&nb_ppp=50&af=on "http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=alpha\_silouettes&nb\_ppp=50&af=on")

Dear Grot Esque, Heron & Dan

Thanks for your help Heron2001's font was closer to what I was looking for and might do the job, but I really appreciate your help Grot!

Hearon2001 thanks for the bunny defense, but thats not why..i actually owned two pet bunnies so I just love bunnies thats where my name comes from...as far as the font Dan they why is I have a job to do for a customer based in new orleans and sexy girl silhouettes are hot there so her requested this type of font.

I think he literally wanted the letters made out of the girl silhouettes but I think the alpha silhouette has that new orleans french feel.

Thanks All,  
Kristen
